Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. We believe in delivering the best possible experience to our customers, and we're confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations. For a limited time, I'm offering you the opportunity to own this product at an exclusive price of $100. This is an excellent chance to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll arrange for delivery right away. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
